title: Rookie Blue Season 3 Completed(.mp4)
description:

We follow five officers from their first day on the streetsÃ¢â‚¬â€as they're plunged into the world of big-city policing, where even the smallest mistake can have life-or-death consequences.

And not the best dadÃ¢â‚¬â€lately she's been spending a lot of time picking him up off the floor, and taking the Scotch bottle out of his hands. Still, all she ever wanted to be is a cop. 

Andy's a born rescuer, but she joined the force not just to help people but to discover a sense of family she's never had. And sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s definitely found it among her fellow traineesÃ¢â‚¬â€a group of young, ambitious twenty-somethings, carrying big guns and even bigger emotional baggage.

These five rookies trained at the Academy togetherÃ¢â‚¬â€they learned the rules togetherÃ¢â‚¬â€they fought, drank and slept together. Now theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re walking the beat together, learning the toughest kind of policing there is. They're the first responders. First on the scene, never knowing what dangers they're about to face. The cops who never know whether their shiftÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s going to bring them a dead body, a violent home invasion, a john sweep, or a drug raid.

TheyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re making mistakes, theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re trying to get ahead, theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re trying to watch each otherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s backs while proving they can do this on their own. And theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re doing all this as they learn first-hand the hardest kind of policing there is.

Rookie Blue is a drama about the trials and triumphs, competition and camaraderie of this rookie family, who are about to learn the hard way that no amount of training can prepare them for the jobÃ¢â‚¬Â¦or for life.
